text: Jerzmanowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north-west of Chojnów, west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Jerzmanowice
title: Jerzmanowice, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
